Curvature pinching for complete kaehler submanifolds of a complex projective space

description.en:
A classification of complete Kaehler submanifolds Mn in P n+p(C) with scalar curvature p &gt
 n2 is given, resolving a conjecture of K. Ogiue.

On the rigidity of hypersurfaces which are complete

description.en: The notion of the rigidity is important for classifying the hypersurfaces in a real space form. It is well known that a hypersurface M-n in a real space form has the rigidity in the case of the type number >= 3 at each point of M-n. The purpose of the present paper is to prove that Mn has the rigidity in the case of M-n being complete, c not equal 0 and n >= 3.

work_title.ja: 曲率作用素による微分幾何学的超曲面の特徴付けについて
幾何学的確率について
情報幾何を利用したアファイン空間内の微分幾何学的アファイン超曲面に関する研究
定義が明示されていない数学用語と生徒の理解に関する研究
空間型内の極小部分多様体について

research_project_title.en: On characterizations of submnanifolds in a space form by the differential equations

description.en: The purpose of the study characterize totally real submanifolds of a complex apace form with the constant holomorphic sectional curvature 4 admitting differential function f which satisfy \Delta f + \lambda f = 0.

research_project_title.ja: 微分方程式による空間型内の部分多様体の特徴付けについて

description.ja: 定正則断面曲率４をもつ複素空間型内のｎ次元全実部分多様体がΔf+λf=0を満たす微分可能な関数を許容するときどんな空間になるかの特徴付けをするのがこの研究の目的である。
